headline: What Catalysts Are Rewriting The Verizon Communications (VZ) Narrative Now?
summary: The latest update to the Verizon Communications narrative comes with a slightly higher fair value estimate, edging from about US$47.48 to roughly US$47.60 per share, and a higher discount rate in the models at about 8.39% compared with 8.11% before. Revenue growth assumptions have also been revised to roughly 2.16% from about 1.35%, reflecting how analysts are incorporating recent industry commentary and company specific developments into their forecasts. Stay tuned to see how you can keep on...

headline: Fidelity Has a Pure Play ETF You Should Look at for 2026
summary: The Magnificent Seven stocks represent 35% to 40% of the S&P 500, creating historically high concentration risk for investors heading into 2026. While tech exposure remains essential, betting on seven mega-cap names leaves portfolios vulnerable to sector-specific shocks and valuation compression. Fidelity MSCI Communication Services Index ETF (NYSEARCA:FCOM) offers a compelling alternative: pure-play communications sector ... Fidelity Has a Pure Play ETF You Should Look at for 2026

headline: Augmented World Expo Asia 2026 Announces Agenda
summary: The Augmented World Expo Asia has just released the agenda for the AWE Asia 2026 conference, hosted in Singapore from February 2-4. The agenda will include 90+ speakers presenting 60 sessions across 8 content tracks in VR, AR, and AI technologies.

headline: Verizon Outpaces Its Industry in a Year: How to Play the Stock?
summary: VZ has outpaced its wireless industry over the past year as 5G upgrades, network slicing and new partnerships fuel growth despite debt and competition.
